channel.title: Raja Ashok - My Thoughts, Opinions and Views
channel.description: A Passionate Coder in this Planet, with a decade of Industry experience in Communication Protocol Development.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is my Hello World post on my blog. After a decade of serving as a Passionate Coder in Communication Protocol, I decided to share my thoughts, opinions and views about the technology which I am working.
